=== Current Issues ===
* Suspend-to-ram is not working, when turning on screen stays turned off and notebook is not reacting on anything
* 33372 [Gutsy] Suspend to disk is not working, when turning on screen stays turned off and notebook is not reacting on anything
* 172262 [Gutsy] Impress video Low Quality - Suspected anti-aliasing problem
* 160866 [Gutsy] Hue color & Contrast way off on Video apps
* 177129 [Gutsy] Laptop lid close button dosen't work (regression -Feisty worked well)
* 172529 [Gutsy] Network applet dosen't activate ethernet connection, when booted from CD and static IP is assigned using Network applet, and then cable is connected
* '''with F.08 BIOS, cpufreq dosen't work! It is a HP issue, flashing BIOS to F.09 RESOLVES this issue!'''
